name: Anthony Gilchrist
description: In 2077, Anthony started secretly collaborating with theMaelstromgang, then led byDeclan Griffinaka "Brick", acting as their mole. Gilchrist would provide Brick with details about Militech shipments via his contact,Ofelia Sirawianaka "Patricia", and Maelstrom would steal the shipments and give Gilchrist a cut of the profits after selling the goods. This deal ended up crossing a line when Gilchrist leaked the security protocols for an important Militech convoy which contained aFlathead, allowing Maelstrom to capture it. Meredith Stout, a Militech senior operations manager, traced the leak...
